name: Al Majeed
description: Al Majeed is one of the names of Allah in Islam, which translates to 'The Glorious' or 'The Most Majestic'. It signifies the perfection, greatness, and honor of Allah, highlighting His supreme status and divine attributes.
summary: The name Al Majeed emphasizes Allah's majesty and glory. It is derived from the Arabic root 'm-j-d', which relates to honor and greatness. This name reminds believers of the importance of recognizing and respecting the grandeur of Allah.
